name: My First Game Jam Game
description:
You are a sentient cloud of smoke with the ability to control other creatures. Take control of the creatures you find in each room and solve the button puzzle to proceed to the next.

Can use controller or keyboard

controls:

movements: WASD, arrow keys, or left analog stick

enter/exit characters: Tab or X on controller

use character abilities: Space or Y on controller

Jump/Select: Shift or A on controller

reset position: Q or select button on controller
